title: Paper with whale
subtitle: The professor notes the omission of the withdrawal of whales from the marine biology paper, which has been re-presented several times by different students.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The student in the marine biology class turns around in a term paper that provides a polite explanation for the whale and gets A. In the following year, another student copys and submits the paper, and also receives the A mark. The third student who submitted the same paper neglected to include the whale painting and received only a letter "B" from the professor and his written comment: "I loved him more with the whale."
